overview.tax_authority: Financial Administration of the Republic of Slovenia (FURS)

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Various exemptions and deductions apply, including dependent allowances and charitable contributions.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 15.5% employee, 8.85% employer (shared between employer and employee).

withholding_taxes.dividends: 15% (5% for EU parent companies with minimum 10% ownership).
withholding_taxes.interest: 15% (0% for bonds issued by the Slovenian government).

corporate_tax.deductions: Various deductions and allowances apply, including depreciation and research and development costs.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

property_tax.rate: 0.1% to 1.4% of assessed value, depending on property type and location.

inheritance_tax.rate: 0% to 39%, depending on relationship to deceased.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Self-employed or employed by a company outside of Slovenia, annual income of at least 3,500 EUR.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Flat tax rate of 10% on income up to 100,000 EUR.

special_economic_zones.name: Ljubljana Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Exemption from property tax, reduced corporate tax rate of 15%.
special_economic_zones.business_types: Various, including manufacturing, logistics, and technology.

special_economic_zones.name: Maribor Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.business_types: Various, including automotive, engineering, and agriculture.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: 0% on crypto capital gains (held more than 6 months).

nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: 0% on NFT capital gains (held more than 6 months).

additional_notes.economic_stability: Slovenia is a member of the Eurozone and has a stable economy.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 40th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
